resources.b1d: By installing the application working with OsMo, share your location easily
resources.b2d: When you start sending coordinates, generated links of the form https://osmo.mobi/s/**_***_** it is valid until you complete the trip
resources.b3d: If you need to give permanent access to your location you can create a Permalink. The link will always show your location (current or saved). Please note that we also see your online status.
resources.gtk0: Every time you start and stop monitoring creates a "trip", which is then stored in history
resources.gtk1: At the same time not one authorized device or one account can have only one trip
resources.gtk2: Once travel has commenced, within 6 hours, should be sent at least one coordinate, otherwise it is considered empty and will be removed
resources.gtk3: The maximum number of sent coordinate for the trip ~25 000, after exceeding the limit point it may be forcibly terminated
resources.gtk4: If you are not an authorized device does not send coordinates within a few hours, the trip will automatically end
resources.gtk5: If the account is not received coordinate within 8 hours, the trip will automatically end
resources.gtk6: If the majority of the points sent in the last 24 hours, with zero speed - the drive is considered useless and will not be saved
resources.session_ended_description: To continue monitoring this person, you can ask them for a new link, a permanent link, add them to friends, or create a group
resources.personal_not_found_description: You may ask whoever you sent it new
